item.description: 硬件介绍 主要元件 主要电路图 主要原理 代码实现 #include <string.h>/* Define used pin */ int pin3 = 3; int pin4 = 6; int pin9 = 9; int pin10 = 4; /* str stores message from PC */ char str[7]; void setup() { /* Begin the serial */ Serial.begin(9600); /* Enable output pin */ pinMode(pin3, OUTPUT); pinMode(pin4, OUTPUT); pinMode(pin9, OUTPUT); pinMode(pin10, OUTPUT); /* Write analog signal */ analogWrite(pin3,255); analogWrite(pin4,255); analogWrite(pin9,255); analogWrite(pin10,255); } /* Convert from char to num */ int char_to_num(char c) { return c - '0'; } /* Main loop */ void loop() { /* Make sure the serial is abailable */ if(Serial.
